title: Kyiv Prepares 425 Shelters in Case of a Russian Nuclear Attack
description: Worries that the Kremlin might turn to its nuclear arsenal have deepened since President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia raised the specter of using such weapons to hold on to territorial gains.
dc:creator: Marc Santora
media:credit: Finbarr O'Reilly for The New York Times
media:description: The basement of a cafe that doubles as a bomb shelter last month in Kyiv, Ukraineâ€™s capital.
